name: Skipping Stone
description:
This game is a survival arena shooter, with similar mechanics to endless runners ie. trying to survive as long as possible to receive the highest score. The game was a concept inspired a while ago by two games primarily Devil Daggers with it’s frantic gameplay and when overcoming some design challenges- adding an explosive attack which was drawn from Junkrat in the game Overwatch. The difference being that this game has a skipping/bouncing stone that teleports the player.

Credit:
